textBeforeTable: Please use the chart below to convert between standard size formats Size Conversion Chart Browse and buy Armani Jeans clothing & accessories online at Jules B today... The men's Armani Jeans range provides a host of informal separates with a no-fuss finish including polo shirts, casual shirts, t-shirts and the label's signature denim jeans. Supported by a range of well-edited sporting accessories from bags and wallets to belts and caps, the Armani menswear collection provides the pinnacle of urban off-duty styling. Summing up the essence of the mainline whilst incorporating a playful ready-to-wear element, the women's Armani Jeans collection focuses on designer-led day wear. Spanning t-shirts and knitwear to off-duty denim jeans and relaxed day dresses, this range is underpinned by a host of accessories including bags and purses to complement the clothing. “With Armani Jeans I am always thinking about young people with an independent spirit.” Founded in 1981, Armani Jeans is the casual, denim-led collection created by Italian fashion designer Giorgio Armani. Featuring clothing, shoes and accessories, the Armani Jeans collection is a relaxed contrast to his other lines whilst using diverse colours, prints and textures to create a youthful diffusion range.
